package.name: qbo_driver
package.description: qbo_driver is a ROS 2 package designed for the QBO platform running on the Jetson Orin NX. It provides a hardware diagnostics node that monitors system health in real-time (temperature, memory, disk, CPU, GPU, etc.), with configurable alert thresholds. Diagnostics are published using the standard DiagnosticArray message format.
package.author: zwolinski
